FuncDef:
The stp pvid-consistency protection mode command configures a protection mode for PVID inconsistency between directly connected ports in VLAN-based Spanning Tree (VBST).
The undo stp pvid-consistency protection mode command deletes the protection mode for PVID inconsistency between directly connected ports in VBST. The stp pvid-consistency protection mode command configures a protection mode for PVID inconsistency between directly connected ports in VLAN-based Spanning Tree (VBST). The undo stp pvid-consistency protection mode command deletes the protection mode for PVID inconsistency between directly connected ports in VBST. By default, no protection mode is configured for PVID inconsistency between directly connected ports. That is, the device will be not blocked when the PVIDs of directly connected ports are different.
